alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, southeastern Lexington, west central Sumter and southeastern Richland Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 915 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Columbia Riverwalk, or near West Columbia, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia, West Columbia, Cayce, Forest Acres, McEntire Air Base, Red Bank, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Gaston, Eastover, Congaree National Park, Hopkins, Horrel Hill, SC State Farmer`s Market, Columbia Metro Airport, SC State Fair Grounds, West Columbia Riverwalk, Sandy Run, Fort Jackson and Five Points. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 between mile markers 112 and 134. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
